item.title: I cant find something oh noes! :'(
item.dc:creator: @omg_noobish omg noobish
item.description:
@omg_noobish wrote:

[quote=“Mod Taharok, post:1, topic:24871”]Ok before we can fix the compiler and runeserver, we need to set out variables. Ok go into start menu, then control panel, then system, then advanced, then enviromental variables.

start menu -> control panel -> system -> advanced -> enviromental variables

Ok now find the variable called “path” in the list in that new screen open. Rename it to “PATH” and then for it’s variable value (erase old one):
C:Windows\System32;“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”

You will also need to set a variables called “classpath”. Make a new variable and give it the name classpath. No add this in for it’s value:
“C:\Program Files\Java\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin”[/quote][br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 09:22:28 PM[/size][hr]figured out what to do YESS![br][size=1]Posted on: January 21, 2007, 09:27:33 PM[/size][hr]but one problem, i need help with something els :’(

Read full topic
